column1: * 1952 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Moira Sayer (10 August 1952).
* 1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Carole Ward.
* 1966 - Voice actor André Sogliuzzo is born.
* 1981 - Mythcon 12 at wikipedia:Mills College in wikipedia:Oakland
* 1984 - Mythcon 15 at wikipedia:Mills College in wikipedia:Oakland
* 1986 - Mythcon 17 at wikipedia:California State University in wikipedia:Long Beach
* 1997 - Mythcon 28 at wikipedia:Pepperdine University in wikipedia:Malibu
* 2005 - The Tolkien Society Guide to Oxford is published.
* 2005 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony plays in Herodion
* 2007 - http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Tatya - 2nd International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in wikipedia:Antwerp
* 2013 - Omentielva - 5th International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages in Helsinki
* 2017 - Omentielva - the Seventh International Conference on J.R.R. Tolkiens Invented Languages at wikipedia:California State University
** The funeral of Kings of Rohan Théoden is held outside the walls of Edoras.Category:Datesfi:10. elokuuta
